opis: Na prodaju je prekrasna kuća na otoku Viru, sa stambenom površinom od 200 m2. Ova prostrana kuća ima ukupno tri stana i idealna je za obitelj ili kao investicija za iznajmljivanje. Kuća se nalazi na mirnoj lokaciji s blizinom mora i pruža sve potrebne pogodnosti za udoban život. Na prizemlju se nalazi stan s dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, kuhinjom, dnevnim boravkom, kupaonicom i terasom. Ovaj stan je savršen za obitelj koja traži ugodan prostor za život i relaksaciju. Također ima pristup dvorištu, koje je prostrano i ima roštilj za uživanje u vanjskim aktivnostima. U dvorištu se nalaze i najmanje tri parkirna mjesta, osiguravajući dovoljno prostora za automobile. Na katu se nalazi studio apartman s velikom terasom, idealan za iznajmljivanje ili kao gostinjski smještaj. Tu je i drugi apartman s jednom spavaćom sobom, kuhinjom, dnevnim boravkom, kupaonicom i velikom terasom. Oba apartmana su moderno uređena i imaju prekrasan pogled na okolicu. Kuća je nedavno renovirana, a krov je potpuno obnovljen 2022. godine, osiguravajući dugotrajnu zaštitu. Voda za kuću dolazi iz bušotine, iako je gradski vodovod prošao uz kuću, pružajući fleksibilnost u odabiru izvora vode. Stolarija je izrađena od PVC materijala i ima ugrađene komarnike na prozorima, pružajući udobnost i zaštitu od insekata. Kuća je potpuno namještena s namještajem od punog drveta, ručno rađenim, kao i vrlo kvalitetna ručno rađena unutarnja stolarija. Ova pažljivo odabrana i kvalitetna oprema pruža toplinu i estetski ugodan interijer. Ne propustite priliku da postanete vlasnikom ove prekrasne kuće na otoku Viru. Za dodatne informacije ili da biste dogovorili razgledavanje, slobodno se obratite. Radujemo se vašem pozivu  i rado ćemo vam pomoći u ostvarenju vaših snova o vlastitoj kući na otoku Viru. Andrea Culi +385 98 80 90 94 For sale is a beautiful house on the island of Vir, with a total living area of 200 sqm. This spacious house consists of three apartments and is perfect for a family or as an investment for rental purposes. It is located in a peaceful area close to the sea and offers all the necessary amenities for comfortable living. On the ground floor, there is an apartment with two spacious bedrooms, a kitchen, a living room, a bathroom, and a terrace. This apartment provides comfort and space for a pleasant family life. It has direct access to a spacious yard equipped with a barbecue, perfect for outdoor gatherings and relaxation. The yard also features at least three parking spaces, ensuring ample parking space for vehicles. On the upper floor, there is a studio apartment with a large terrace, ideal for rental or guest accommodation. There is also another apartment with one bedroom, a kitchen, a living room, a bathroom, and a large terrace. Both apartments are modernly furnished and offer beautiful views of the surroundings. The house has recently been renovated, including a fully renovated roof in 2022, ensuring long-lasting protection. Water for the house comes from a well, although there is the option to connect to the municipal water supply, which passes by the house. The windows are made of PVC material and have built-in mosquito screens, providing comfort and protection against insects. The house is fully furnished with high-quality solid wood furniture, handmade, and features meticulously crafted interior woodwork. This carefully selected and high-quality equipment creates a warm and aesthetically pleasing interior. Don't miss the opportunity to become the owner of this beautiful house on the island of Vir. For additional information or to arrange a viewing, please feel free to contact: Andrea Culi Phone: +385 98 80 90 94 We look forward to your call and will be happy to assist you in fulfilling your dream of owning a house on the island of Vir.
